label: Organization Schema (sameAs Complete)

confirmationArtifact: llms.txt file present at /llms.txt

tooltipTemplates.why: AI-crawler guidance for content consumption; improves LLM ingestion usability (emerging).

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No AI crawler guidance (emerging standard).

label: Wikidata Entity
confirmationArtifact: Wikidata entity (Q-ID) for company/brand

tooltipTemplates.why: Structured entity graph for machines/LLMs; stabilizes brand facts and relationships.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: Not in structured knowledge graph. Miss AI entity linking.

confirmationArtifact: Wikipedia article about company or brand

confirmationArtifact: Dedicated case studies section with projects, outcomes, specs, photos, client type

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No proof of experience. Weak E-E-A-T for B2B.

confirmationArtifact: Knowledge Panel shows correct website, logo, socials, founders, location

confirmationArtifact: Dedicated author bios for technical content creators/leaders

confirmationArtifact: Visible company identity signals (legal name, registration, addresses, contact methods)

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No visible company identity. Fraud perception risk.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No compliance/quality proof for B2B buyers.

confirmationArtifact: Consistent NAP across web listings and directories

confirmationArtifact: Third-party recognition (trade magazines, portals, interviews)

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No third-party validation. Weak authority.

confirmationArtifact: Product schema on product/service pages with specs, price, availability

confirmationArtifact: Authentic photos/videos of team, facility, installations, demos

confirmationArtifact: After-sales clarity (installation, warranty, support process)

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No after-sales clarity. Buyer hesitation.

confirmationArtifact: Testimonials tied to specific use-cases (industry, scope, outcome)

confirmationArtifact: Wikidata entity with complete facts (name, website, industry, country, social links)

businessImpact.absenceImpact: Incomplete entity facts. LLM/AI entity confusion.

confirmationArtifact: Memberships in credible industry bodies listed on website

businessImpact.absenceImpact: Miss industry credibility signals.

label: Website Reachable
confirmationArtifact: HTTP 200 response with valid HTML content and SSL certificate

tooltipTemplates.how: Direct HTTP request to domain with SSL verification.
tooltipTemplates.why: Your website is the foundation of your online presence.
tooltipTemplates.actionAbsent: Set up a professional website immediately.
tooltipTemplates.actionPresent: Ensure fast load times and mobile responsiveness.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No digital storefront. Invisible to customers searching online.
businessImpact.partialImpact: Poor SSL/speed hurts trust and conversions.

label: About + Contact Pages
confirmationArtifact: /about and /contact pages returning HTTP 200

tooltipTemplates.why: Entity and trust clarity for users + crawlers; required for credibility and conversions in B2B.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No entity clarity. Hurts trust and E-E-A-T.

confirmationArtifact: Verified Bing Webmaster property

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No Bing indexing diagnostics.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: Search engines may crawl inefficiently.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: No legal trust baseline. Enterprise buyers hesitate.

tooltipTemplates.actionAbsent: Add Organization schema to your homepage.

businessImpact.absenceImpact: Miss rich snippets in search results. Reduced CTR.
